name: chaoschain-ace-sdk
description: Session Key SDK and OpenClaw skill for ACE Phase 0 x402 payments

scripts.typecheck: npm run build -w @chaoschain/ace-session-key-sdk && npm run typecheck -w @chaoschain/ace-session-key-sdk && npm run typecheck -w @chaoschain/demo-compute-api && npm run typecheck -w @chaoschain/ace-examples
scripts.check:no-nested-compute-api: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='packages/demo-compute-api/packages'; if (fs.existsSync(p)) { console.error('Unexpected nested directory: ' + p); process.exit(1); } console.log('No nested demo-compute-api packages directory detected.');"
